headline.main: Study Finds High Risk to Overweight Women

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A large study of middle-aged and younger women has shown that being overweight by virtually any degree increases the risk of heart disease.
docs.snippet: LEAD: A large study of middle-aged and younger women has shown that being overweight by virtually any degree increases the risk of heart disease.
